message.name: ERR_BUILDING_LIFE_EVENT
message.locale: An error occurred while building life event of type %1s.

message.name: ERR_GETTING_SCHEMA_FOR_LIFE_EVENT
message.locale: An error occurred getting schema %1s for life event type %2s.

message.name: ERR_PROCESSING_DIFFERENCE_COMMAND
message.locale: An error occurred processing a difference command.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_TYPE_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Name, %1s, must be unique.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Display Name, %1s, must be unique.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_CATEGORY_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Life Event Category Name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_CATEGORY_SELECT_A_LIFE_EVENT
message.locale: Select a Life Event for this Category.

message.name: ERR_FV_NO_CATEGORIES_SELECTED
message.locale: Select at least one category.

message.name: ERR_FV_NO_LIFE_EVENTS_SELECTED
message.locale: Select at least one Life Event.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT
message.locale: The Life Event Context already exists for context %1s and type %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_LIFE_EVENT_ORIGINAL_DATA
message.locale: The Life Event original data has the wrong schema %1s. Should be %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_LIFE_EVENT_TYPE_NAME
message.locale: The Life Event Display Name is mandatory.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_LIFE_EVENT_SCHEMA
message.locale: Schema is mandatory in Life Event Type.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT_NAME
message.locale: Context name is mandatory in Life Event Context.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT_TYPE
message.locale: Context type is mandatory in Life Event Context.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_TYPE_IS_ON_ALL_CHANNELS
message.locale: This Life Event type is already associated with all available Channels.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Display Name, '%1s', must be unique.

message.name: ERR_FV_CITIZENCONSENTIFCHOICEONLY_SPECIFIED_IF_CITIZENCONSENTENABLED_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Citizen Consent If One Choice Only can only be specified if Citizen Consent Enabled.

message.name: ERR_FV_LIFE_EVENT_QUERSTION_AND_ANSWER_SCRIPT_NAME_SAME
message.locale: The answer script must have a different name to the question script.

message.name: ERR_FV_IMAGE_ALT_TEXT_SPECIFIED_WHEN_IMAGE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Image Alt text can only be specified when an Image and an Image Name have been specified.

message.name: ERR_NO_TARGET_SYSTEM_SERVICE_FOR_LIFE_EVENT
message.locale: There is no Target System Service specified for the Life Event %1s.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_PARSE_RULESET_LIFE_EVENT
message.locale: Cannot parse the recommendations ruleset of Life Event %1s.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_ADD_AN_IMAGE_ON_MODIFY
message.locale: A Life Event Type must have an image specified on insert if it is to have its image modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_RULE_SET_NAME_INVALID
message.locale: The Ruleset name entered is invalid. The valid characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _. Spaces are not allowed.

message.name: ERR_NO_REMOTE_SYSTEM_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one Remote System must be selected.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_TYPE_SELECTED
message.locale: A case must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SENDING_TO_REMOTE_SYSTEM
message.locale: There was an error sending Life Event %1s to Remote System %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUBMISSION_TEXT_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The message text entered is too long (%1s), maximum allowed is %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The description entered is too long (%1s), maximum allowed is %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_ADDITIONAL_INFO_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The additional info entered is too long (%1s), maximum allowed is %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUBMISSION_TEXT_TOO_LONG_NOLEN
message.locale: The message text entered is too long, please reduce the message size.

message.name: ERR_FV_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG_NOLEN
message.locale: The description entered is too long, please reduce the description size.

message.name: ERR_FV_ADDITIONAL_INFO_TOO_LONG_NOLEN
message.locale: The additional info entered is too long, please reduce the info size.
